name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on Materials Sciences and Nanomaterials
content: Publication of ICMSN 2024: The registered and presented papers will be published into Materials Science Forum (ISSN print 0255-5476 / ISSN web 1662-9752), which will be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc.
